titleStmt.title: A Godly and short treatise vpon the Lordes prayer, the xii articles of the Christian faith, and the Ten commaundementes.
titleStmt.author: Some, Robert, 1542-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in London at the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson, for George Bishop.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Some by STC (2nd ed.) at 22906.5.
Title within ornamental border, initial, tailpieces.
Imperfect: copy at 2355:6b lacks all before B1.
Reproduction of originals in: Lambeth Palace Library (reel 1799:17) and British Library (reel 2355:6b).
